newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - IBAH raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - IBAH raised to buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it raised the rating IBAH Inc to buy from hold, citing improving business prospects and price valuation.
-- Hambrecht said the company's recent acquisition of the Hardart group increased its size so that it is being invited to bid on more and larger contracts.
-- Hambrecht did not raise earnings estimates, and sees "a greater chance of upside." It estimates the company will earn $0.06 a share in 1996 and $0.26 in 1997.
-- IBAH provides product development and clinical services to pharmaceutical and medical device companies.
